content: The "Third Higher Education Extension Act of 2006" extends programs under the Higher Education Extension Act of 2005 until June 30, 2007. It also amends the eligibility criteria for lender trustee relationships with institutions of higher education. Section 504(a) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 is amended to allow for a 5-year grant period to Hispanic-serving institutions. Additionally, guaranty agency account maintenance fees are addressed in Section 458(b) of the Act. Section 458(b) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 is amended to calculate loan amounts differently.
